text: In Person is the debut (and only) album of UK garage duo Sweet Female Attitude. It spawned the number two hit, "Flowers". Due to low sales of other singles, the album was only released in Germany. The albums music is mainly UK garage and R&B.; ==Track listing== ==References== *http://www.discogs.com/Sweet-Female-Attitude-In-Person/release/651127 Category:2001 albums Category:Debut albums Category:UK garage albums Category:R&B; albums
title: In Person
